A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the movie actually angry.  Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy clearl.  I don't understand the hero's journey that made Star Wars great.  They replaced substance with virtue signaling. \n\n I don't see how Disney can correct this mess.   Star Wars wasn't just a bunch of action movies like Marvel comics.
